QuestData.Title: Li Li and the Grain
QuestData.Description: I'll let you in on my brewing plan, $n: I'm planning on making an Emperor Stout. Done right, it should be dark, roasty, and high in alcohol.$b$b<A frown appears on Chen's face.>$b$bI just realized... I never told my plans to Li Li. She'll have no idea what type of grain to bring back!$b$bCould you speak with her? I need her to bring back the sweetest malted grains she can find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Li Li at the Imperial Granary in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Li Li at the Imperial Granary in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: $n? What are you doing here?$b$bSo, Uncle Chen wants sweet malts? No problem! Let's get to the taste testing.
